lead_paragraph: News of continued production troubles in Nigeria and an upbeat forecast from Goldman Sachs gave the energy sector a lift.

headline.print_headline: Higher Oil Prices Lift Wall St. Out of the Doldrums
headline.main: Wall St. Rises, Buoyed Again by Oil Prices

snippet: News of continued production troubles in Nigeria and an upbeat forecast from Goldman Sachs gave the energy sector a lift.
abstract: Stocks break three-day losing streak following jump in oil prices and news on several key deals.
